Posts.Content: There are different things they look at to diagnose. I don't think someone can guarentee it "will*never* be" ca. If that statement was made, I suggest you gather all reports (radiology, cytology, biopsy...) and consider a second opinion prior to surgery. History is important. It all factors in. Read up all you can. Take Care, G
Posts.Title: "atypical duct hyperplasia"?

Posts.Content: You are doing the right thing but it's terrible they have you wait that long. Call the specialists office to see if there are any cancellations that you could take. You might be able to get her in sooner that way.
Posts.Title: Areola discharge 1 2

Posts.Content: Have had stinging and bg fna 2 dif. times on the left. Cluster of cysts they think are lymph nodes on the right and have been looking at that every 6 mo, since the first abnormal mammo/sono etc, I am due for the 1 yr in a few months. In March had bad breast pains, outer left along with the pleurisy I had. The rheumy recommended a gyn to see if I should go for a mammo checkup earlier then I'm supposed to etc. Hormonal fluctuations can cause cyclic breast pain. When I get sharp pains, I note it on a calander along with location (the breast as the face of a clock, facing away from you), like 6:00, outer edge, or closer to nipple etc. Cysts happened to be where I had the stinging the first time. Before the mammo I told them when and where. It helps. Do routine self breast exams once a month. It's a good thing...
Posts.Title: Sharp pain in breasts

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by lawrence_pv My right breast is sore and seems to be a little bigger than my left. I have to go to the doctors on Tuesday on next week. I'm so scared How are you?
Posts.Title: Sharp pain in breasts

Posts.Content: ps...Ask them which one is best absorbed, dosage. Look into osteoporosis, bc treatment and calcium supplamentation.
Posts.Title: Arimidex Dangers Please Read!

Posts.Content: Has she had a bone density, or calcium levels checked through bloodwork? She may need supplamentation.
